title: meastro error
body:
when i click the league launcher, it goes strait to the login, and skips the updater, and then  a dialog box comes up and says it cant connect to maestro and suggests to restart,.. but that offcourse dosnt work

and on the net and forums, say uninstall avast or whatever it is, i dont have that, so does anyone know what happened?

replies.body: Try unpinning Lol from the taskbar. It worked for me.

Woah, that's pretty cool but bad at the same time. You could probably do some swaggy stuff with that.

Anyway, what OS are you using?

So what it seems like is that a service is failing to start (most likely maestro) which is preventing the update process from happening at all. I suggest you wait two days, and then reinstall the client front.
